title: medicina integradora - English translation – Linguee
description: Many translated example sentences containing "medicina integradora" – English-Spanish dictionary and search engine for English translations.
text:
▾Dictionary Spanish-English
[medicina](/spanish-english/translation/medicina.html) f — [integradora](/spanish-english/translation/integradora.html) adj— [See alternative translations]

Hay mucho por saber sobre el poder la conexión y el toque humanos, y de simplemente estar junto a alguien, y si esto podría contribuir a[...]
la sanación", añadió el[...] Dr. J. Adam Rindfleisch, practicante de medicina integradora y profesor asistente de medicina familiar [...]
de la Facultad de medicina[...]
y salud pública de la Facultad de Wisconsin.

There's a lot out there about the power of touch and human connection and just being present with somebody, and whether that might be contributing to healing,"[...]
added Dr. J. Adam[...] Rindfleisch, an integrative-medicine practitioner and assistant professor of family medicine at the University [...]
of Wisconsin School[...]
of Medicine and Public Health.

El Centro para Terapias Integradoras Leonard P. Zakim en Dana-Farber provee estos y otros[...]
servicios, como por ejemplo, Reiki, asesoramiento sobre[...] nutrición, consultas de medicina integradora, medicación y musicoterapia.

|
The Leonard P. Zakim Center for Integrative Therapies at Dana-Farber provides these[...]
and other services including Reiki, nutritional[...] counseling, integrative medicine consults, meditation, [...]
and music therapy.

mejora y uno quizás no sepa el mecanismo, y eso está bien", aseguró.

I have to tell you that in my[...] time of doing integrative medicine, sometimes people get [...]
better and you might not know the[...]
mechanism, but that's fine," he stated.
womenshealth.gov

de California, Irvine y en el Consejo[...]
de Directores para una compañía de nutrición privada.

for a privately held nutrition company.

con la medicina alopática tradicional.

convencional, pero[...]
la amplía con procesos terapéuticos especiales.

and modern, and that it[...] is a truly integrative medicine because it is based on mainstream medicine but extends [...]

children and youngsters must benefit from the adequate support their specific impairment requires.

digital.

los desajustes de cualificaciones y el desempleo de larga duración.
